name: The Scrounge Recruit Program
detailed_description:
.

The Scrounge Recruit Program is a horror game about a Teenager who discovers an "organization" (Cult) Called the scrounge. The Recruit program features puzzles and objectives to prove your worthiness to the Scrounge. The gameplay features puzzles that range from easy to difficult and provides a unique experience where threats can range from moderate to severe within seconds. The gameplay time can be from 30 minutes (if you know what you are doing) to 4 hours (if it is your first time). The game features original assets and textures all created by a solo developer.

.

You are a teen who has stumbled upon an organization called "The scrounge" The Scrounge believe that it is their job to cleanse the world of filthy and undeserving people. There is no going back. Your task is to complete the recruit program filled with puzzles and tasks to see if you have what it takes. Failing to complete the recruit program results in death.
